summary: A disgraced former LAPD detective leads a home invasion in search of millions in stolen money. The plan goes awry and homicide detectives seeking answers interrogate the only survivors; a thief and a victim.
cast: Yul Vazquez|A.J. Buckley|Gabrielle Union|Giancarlo Esposito|Max Ryan|Jason George|Anjelah Johnson-Reyes|Patricia Kara|James Madio|RZA|Brett Donowho|Erin Cardillo|Noa Dori|Mía Maestro|Michael Matthias|Amanda Ward|Alayna Corrick|Shishonia Livingston|Brandin Rackley|Nicole Bilderback|F. Valentino Morales|Kelvin Brown|Norma Parker|Kinetic|Todd Mello|Kellyanne O'Callaghan
title: The Box
